ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.98"
SHALL conform to Consol Procedure Activity Procedure template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:11212)
Required to document a procedure not performed, with required "reason not performed" observation

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10496)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.03, for which use ICD10-PCS and EArrest.09, for which use Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation type (VS 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57) and EArrest.10 (therapeutic hypothermia); if = true, include here as ICD-10 PCS "6A4" and EArrest.03: 3003001 Attempted Defibrillation = ICD10-PCS Defibrillation 5A2204Z 3003005 Initiated Chest Compressions: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from this value if necessary 3003003 Attempted Ventilation: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from this value if necessary 3003007 Not Attempted-Considered Futile = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003009 Not Attempted-DNR Orders = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003011 Not Attempted-Signs of Circulation = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10498)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Abandoned Procedure Reason Observation (CONF:10510)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Abandoned Procedure Reason Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.130)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:10499)/@code="Aborted" Aborted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:10500)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.15

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10497)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.01 goes in effectiveTime.low If an abandoned time is recorded, EArrest.15 goes in effectiveTime.high

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (CONF:10502), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet IVSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.56 DYNAMIC (CONF:10501)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.13 Required conditionally if procedure code is intravenous catheterization (E303)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10503)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Prior Indicator (CONF:10515)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Prior Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.131)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10504)
Important for airway insertion
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Number Of Attempts Observation (CONF:10519)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Number Of Attempts Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.132)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10505)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Successful Observation (CONF:10523)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Successful Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.133)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10506)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Complications Observation (CONF:10527)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Complications Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.179)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10507)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Patient Response Observation (CONF:10531)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Patient Response Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.135)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] performer (CONF:10508)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:10536)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10539)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.09, ID equal to the EMS professional's agency ID number
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10537), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.46 DYNAMIC (CONF:10538)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.10

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10509)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Airway Confirmation Observation (CONF:10540)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Airway Confirmation Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.175)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:11089)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Reason Procedure Not Attempted Observation (CONF:11088)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reason Procedure Not Attempted Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.137)
SHALL conform to Consol Procedure Activity Procedure template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PROC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7652)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:7653)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:11212)
Required to document a procedure not performed, with required "reason not performed" observation
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7655)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10496)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.03, for which use ICD10-PCS and EArrest.09, for which use Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation type (VS 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57) and EArrest.10 (therapeutic hypothermia); if = true, include here as ICD-10 PCS "6A4" and EArrest.03: 3003001 Attempted Defibrillation = ICD10-PCS Defibrillation 5A2204Z 3003005 Initiated Chest Compressions: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from this value if necessary 3003003 Attempted Ventilation: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from this value if necessary 3003007 Not Attempted-Considered Futile = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003009 Not Attempted-DNR Orders = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003011 Not Attempted-Signs of Circulation = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:10499)/@code="Aborted" Aborted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:10500)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.15

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10497)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.01 goes in effectiveTime.low If an abandoned time is recorded, EArrest.15 goes in effectiveTime.high
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActPriority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 STATIC (CONF:7668)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7670)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (CONF:10502), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet IVSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.56 DYNAMIC (CONF:10501)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.13 Required conditionally if procedure code is intravenous catheterization (E303)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:7683), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 STATIC 2 (CONF:16082)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:7697)
This specimen is for representing specimens obtained from a procedure.
Such specimens SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] specimenRole (CONF:7704)
Such specimens specimenRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7716)
Such specimens To indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen, the Procedure/specimen/specimenRole/id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer/specimen/ specimenRole/id. (CONF:7717)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:7765, CONF:7752, CONF:15912)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:7718)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:7720)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7731)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7732)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:7733)
This representedOrganization SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734)
This representedOrganization MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:7886, CONF:7887, CONF:15915)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7775, CONF:7776, CONF:15913)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:7779, CONF:7780, CONF:15914)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:7751, CONF:7752, CONF:15911)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:7768)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8009)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:7769)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter (CONF:7770)
This encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7771)
This encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7772)
This encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:7773)
This encounter MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16843)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10498)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Abandoned Procedure Reason Observation (CONF:10510)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Abandoned Procedure Reason Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.130)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10503)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Prior Indicator (CONF:10515)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Prior Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.131)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10504)
Important for airway insertion
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Number Of Attempts Observation (CONF:10519)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Number Of Attempts Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.132)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10505)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Successful Observation (CONF:10523)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Successful Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.133)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10506)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Complications Observation (CONF:10527)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Complications Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.179)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10507)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Procedure Patient Response Observation (CONF:10531)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Patient Response Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.135)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] performer (CONF:10508)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:10536)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10539)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.09, ID equal to the EMS professional's agency ID number
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10537), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.46 DYNAMIC (CONF:10538)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.10

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10509)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Airway Confirmation Observation (CONF:10540)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Airway Confirmation Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.175)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:11089)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Reason Procedure Not Attempted Observation (CONF:11088)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reason Procedure Not Attempted Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.137)

code in a procedure activity SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:19207)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7658)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15908)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15909)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15910)
methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:7890)
entryRelationship with target entry encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8009)
participant with target entry Product Instance SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" Device (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7752)
participant with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7766)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:7777)
